Text.val: ... prepare path/filename for CSV output file

ExpSyntax.val: Trim({0,7})&' and (DEPT_INCASSODEPARTMENT = '&ASCIIChr(39)&'Y'&ASCIIChr(39)&' or DEPT_LIMITDEPARTMENT = '&ASCIIChr(39)&'Y'&ASCIIChr(39)&' or DEPT_INVOICEDEPARTMENT = '&ASCIIChr(39)&'Y'&ASCIIChr(39)&' or DEPT_PAYMENTDEPARTMENT = '&ASCIIChr(39)&'Y'&ASCIIChr(39)&' or DEPT_LEGALDEPARTMENT = '&ASCIIChr(39)&'Y'&ASCIIChr(39)&')'
